description: This file defines the NebiusTools class, a toolkit for interacting with Nebius AI Studio's text-to-image API. It includes methods for initializing the client, generating images from text prompts, and handling API responses, including decoding base64 image data and adding images to an agent.

classes.name: NebiusTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for generating images via Nebius AI Studio's API, extending the Toolkit base class.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the NebiusTools with API key, URL, model, quality, size, style, and additional parameters.

methods.name: _get_client
methods.description: Lazily initializes and returns the Nebius API client.

methods.name: generate_image
methods.description: Generates an image from a text prompt using Nebius API, decodes the base64 response, and adds the image to the agent.
